Text:
Sorry, a mistake:

Should be

NOTE: TimeToLive 24h (torrent's TTL)

as always is with weekly TV packs - take JUST things  you've missed.

Cool, Gossip Girl's back! I actually got quite devastated when you removed it from your uploads. If only I had known that seeding it every week won't be enough to keep it afloat, I could have come here earlier and paid my respects via comments. Please don't remove it ever again. T__T

Anyway, I know requests are currently frozen but can you do British TV show "Skins" once you have the chance? Please, with a cherry on top? Thanks in advance! :)

@Manualist: GG lost status of my "regular" show forever, I am afraid. I explained all my reasons on past torrent where GG should be - and quite frankly - it should happened a year ago.

Why? Such strong fan base - and I can count on fingers ALL Thanks I got for encoding all episodes so far. Bad things must came to an end. Nasty behavior too.
Thanks for Burn Notice, Dexter, Hawaii and WikiRebels!
